title: A CONCISE guide FOR JERKS on how to be less of A JERK: An easy to follow approach to making people less likely to hate you
description: This book has been written for entertainment purposes (and for author venting purposes) only. The author has no qualifications and little (if any) experience which would be considered relevant. Please use your brain and work out whether you agree with the statements in this book. This book is not considered suitable for whiny and/or hyper-sensitive sooks who cannot handle it. This book is not based on any particular person either, but I am sure you know people who fit the bill.Please note this book is intended to be very short as many people do not have the attention span to read anything longer.
author: I.M. Wayword
